string-array.name: quiz_answer
string-array.item: Risk of finding this defect in operation will be reduced
Reduce the risk of software failure in operation
Give the client good knowledge about the status of the project
Identifying the cause of a defect, repairing the code and checking the fix is correct
A defect that causes raw sewage to be dumped into the ocean
Review the design, requirements and code and tracking defects that occurred and that need to be solved
An error causes a defect which is observed as a failure
